Detailed Description

CTreeNodeEditor.

Description: This class is responsible for editing nodes. It also handles the context menu when right clicking on a node.

Limitations: None

Member Function Documentation

bool CTreeNodeEditor::canvasContextEvent (  QContextMenuEvent *  e  ) 
 

CTreeNodeEditor::canvasContextEvent.

Description: This function handles context menu events. If the user clicked on a node, the node context menu is executed and true is returned. Otherwise, false is returned.

Precondition:
None
Postcondition:
None
Parameters:
e,: This is a pointer to the QContextMenuEvent which determines where the user clicked.
Returns:
bool: Returns true if the user clicked on a node and the node context menu is executed and false otherwise.
Limitations: None

void CTreeNodeEditor::historyDone (   )  [slot]
 

CTreeNodeEditor::historyDone.

Description: This function is called when the user is done editing the history value of a node. It saves the new value to the selected node.

Precondition:
None
Postcondition:
The value of the selected node is updated.

bool CTreeNodeEditor::isEditing (  void   ) 
 

CTreeNodeEditor::isEditing.

Description: This function returns true if the user is editing either a node name or value, and false otherwise.

Precondition:
None
Postcondition:
None
Returns:
bool: Returns true if either the name or value line edit is visible for the user to edit the appropriate value and false otherwise.

void CTreeNodeEditor::nameDone (   )  [slot]
 

CTreeNodeEditor::nameDone.

Description: This function is called when a user has finished editing the name of a node. It hides the line edit and saves the new name of the node.

Precondition:
None
Postcondition:
The name of the selected node is updated.
